mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CAST(NEWS_NUM AS UNSIGNED)) AS NEWS_NUM FROM NEWS

SELECT NEWS_NUM , NEWS_NAME , NEWS_CONTENT , NEWS_DATE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CAST(NEWS_NUM AS UNSIGNED)) AS RN , CASE WHEN NEWS_SECTION = 'SYS' THEN '시스템 점검' WHEN NEWS_SECTION = 'TH' THEN '극장' WHEN NEWS_SECTION = 'EV' THEN '행사/이벤트' WHEN NEWS_SECTION = 'RE' THEN '제휴이벤트' WHEN NEWS_SECTION = 'ECT' THEN '기타' ELSE NEWS_SECTION END AS NEWS_SECTION FROM NEWS WHERE 1 = 1
AND NEWS_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchtext}, '%')
AND NEWS_SECTION LIKE CONCAT('%',#{newsSection},'%')
ORDER BY CAST(NEWS_NUM AS UNSIGNED) DESC LIMIT ${startRow}, ${pageSize}
